QuestData.Title: It Used to Be Quiet Here
QuestData.Description:
Well... You don't look like the rest of 'em, do you?
<Chiselgrump shrugs.>
Doesn't bother me. Keep my head down and do my job, making sure these sinstones stay in good shape.
Keep breaking my tools, though.
Bring me some more chisels and I'll teach you an old dredger construction trick.
QuestData.RewardText:
Yeah, these'll last me awhile.
Alright, I'll show you the trick to making a barricade quickly...
